android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.description: Allows an application to capture video output.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

camsurf.com.permission.C2D_MESSAGE.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.adjust.sdk.AdjustReferrerReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: Camsurf: Chat Random & Flirt
playstore_details.description:
Camsurf is a free video chat messenger app for making new friends, finding a date or simply meeting random strangers instantly cam to cam. 

On Camsurf you can:
● Talk to people from 200+ countries 
● Video chat anonymously without logging in
● Instant cam to cam chat with strangers
● Filter connections by location and language 
● And much more…

▷ Be Social: Flirt & Date or Find Friends Worldwide

Camsurf is a social network that was created to bring people together from around the world. Since launching in 2015 Camsurf has helped make over a BILLION connections and is now the fastest growing social app for meeting strangers! 

▷ Free Random Chat Messenger

Camsurf is already the fastest growing random video chat site on the web and with our brand new Android app you can enjoy all the features of the web-based platform directly from your smartphone. Now you can use the webcam on your smartphone to instantly video chat with thousands of random strangers worldwide!

▷ Connected Worldwide Chat 

Camsurf has been downloaded by users in 200+ countries and there are thousands of users online at all times. You can filter connections by country or language and we will instantly match you with strangers based on your preferences. Instantly meet new friends, chat, flirt or even find a date nearby!

▷ Anonymous and Secure

At Camsurf we pride ourselves on security and protecting the personal information of our users. That’s why there are no sign up forms to complete for you to use this app. You can remain anonymous while video chatting in a secure environment. 

▷ Moderation & Banning

Camsurf employs dozens of moderators and we ask all of our users to follow the rules and refrain from acting inappropriately while on webcam. Should you disregard the rules you may be reported and banned from the app for a period of time by our team of moderators. 

**********

● Learn more about us https://camsurf.com/about/
● Find our full list of rules https://camsurf.com/rules/
● Got questions? Read our FAQs https://camsurf.com/faq/
● Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/camsurf
● Follow us on Twitter @camsurfchat

*Note: Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or Wi-Fi connection.
playstore_details.summary: Instant video chat app for meeting new people, dating, flirting and having fun.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Instant video chat app for meeting new people, dating, flirting and having fun.
